name: DEEP DREAMS (BerkN)
description:
DEEP DREAMS Horror Survival Game

(Jumpscare Alert)

Metaphorical expression of reaching dreams.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W = Forward

A = Left

S = Right

D = Backward

E = Up

Q = Down

Numpad or Arrow Keys for Rotating

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay

Collect batteries and find the butterfly. Follow the butterfly to exit.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team Incertum

Pura Game Jam 22 için 48 saatte BerkN tarafından üretilmiştir.

incertum.v@gmail.com
